main event: A round object larger than an aircraft was observed off the coast of California, which appeared to disintegrate into many pieces over the course of several seconds.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on March 31, 1961, and lasted between 6 to 25 seconds., The object exhibited a bright white light and changed to red during the sighting., After disintegration, two pieces were described as resembling burning matches floating away., No sound was reported during the entire observation., The sighting was recorded under Project Blue Book, an Air Force program.
sighted object: a round object disintegrating in the sky
witness description: two observers, including a 14-year-old boy and his 13-year-old brother
